original_text: And said unto them, Sirs, I perceive that this voyage will be with hurt and much damage, not only of the lading and ship, but also of our lives.
korean_text: 말하되 여러분이여 내가 보니 이번 항해가 하물과 배만 아니라 우리 생명에도 타격과 많은 손해를 끼치리라 하되

sentences.original_text: that this voyage will be with hurt and much damage,
sentences.korean_translation: 이 항해가 상해와 많은 손해가 있을 것이라는 것을

sentences.original_text: not only of the lading and ship,
